name: portfoliowebsite
description: This portfolio website is built using the **MERN stack (MongoDB, ExpressJS, ReactJS, NodeJS)** with **RESTful API** to showcase projects, and reviews of people who worked with me. The site is designed to offer a user-friendly experience and easy navigation.

scripts.build: cd front-end && npm install && npm run build
scripts.start: cd server && npm install && node server.js

author: Adil Alizada
